name: King Of Firearms
description:
King Of Firearms is a horizontal scroll shooting type game. The story tells that there is an endless war in the continent of Amas, you need to conquer this continent and end all wars.

Basic operation of the game

Shooting, moving, jumping

Game Features

The game has a variety of bullets that can be arbitrarily matched by the player. It can be roughly divided into the following types.
scattering: Can attack enemies in a wide range.
Penetration: penetrates the terrain and enemies.
split: After hitting the target, it will split multiple bullets and attack again.
Tracking: Automatically find enemies.
